short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy webstore current URL and allows adding more URLs to a list.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension simplifies your shopping experience by allowing you to easily copy URLs of Japanese products from various online stores. Whether you're looking for unique items or popular goods, this tool streamlines the process of requesting purchases through our website, X tenso.

Key Features:
*Easy URL Copying: Quickly copy the product URL from any Japanese e-commerce site.
*Seamless Integration: Paste the URL into our purchase request form on X tenso with minimal effort.
*User-Friendly Interface: 
Designed for simplicity, making it accessible for everyone.

With this extension, you can effortlessly gather your desired products and submit your requests, making your shopping experience from Japan more efficient and enjoyable. Start exploring the vast array of Japanese products today!
